sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnpopupmanage ( POPUP_ID /* */ , POPUP_SJ_NM /* */ , FILE_URL /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_LC /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE /* */ , NTCE_BGNDE /* */ , NTCE_ENDDE /* */ , STOPVEW_SETUP_AT /* */ , NTCE_AT /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_LC /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #popupId# /* */ , #popupSjNm# /* */ , #fileUrl# /* */ , #popupWidthLc# /* */ , #popupWidthSize# /* */ , #ntceBgnde# /* */ , #ntceEndde# /* */ , #stopvewSetupAt# /* */ , #ntceAt# /* */ , #popupVrticlLc# /* */ , #popupVrticlSize# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnpopupmanage SET POPUP_ID=#popupId# /* */ , POPUP_SJ_NM=#popupSjNm# /* */ , FILE_URL=#fileUrl# /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_LC=#popupWidthLc# /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE=#popupWidthSize# /* */ , NTCE_BGNDE=#ntceBgnde# /* */ , NTCE_ENDDE=#ntceEndde# /* */ , STOPVEW_SETUP_AT=#stopvewSetupAt# /* */ , NTCE_AT=#ntceAt# /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_LC=#popupVrticlLc# /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE=#popupVrticlSize# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE POPUP_ID=#popupId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT POPUP_ID /* */ , POPUP_SJ_NM /* */ , FILE_URL /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_LC /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE /* */ , NTCE_BGNDE /* */ , NTCE_ENDDE /* */ , STOPVEW_SETUP_AT /* */ , NTCE_AT /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_LC /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnpopupmanage WHERE POPUP_ID=#popupId# /* */

SELECT POPUP_ID /* */ , POPUP_SJ_NM /* */ , FILE_URL /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_LC /* */ , POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE /* */ , NTCE_BGNDE /* */ , NTCE_ENDDE /* */ , STOPVEW_SETUP_AT /* */ , NTCE_AT /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_LC /* */ , POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnpopupmanage WHERE 1=1
POPUP_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
POPUP_SJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY POPUP_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnpopupmanage WHERE 1=1
POPUP_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
POPUP_SJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
